short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Monitors Boardgaming Online for new games

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome extension that will monitoring Boardgaming online.  It will notify you when you have a game waiting for you to take your turn.  Additionally the icon will turn red.  Clicking on the icon will take you to your games.
